knimeNode.name: Read from GeoTIFF
knimeNode.shortDescription: Reads Spatial Data from GeoTIFF format

intro.p: Reads spatial data stored in GeoTIFF format and decodes the geometries into WKT (Well-known Text Representation). Decodes every attribute of the spatial features as a column of a corresponding KNIME type.
GeoTIFF is raster, or coverage, data. We produce TODO

The actual decoding of the shapefile format is done using the geotools library. The support of GeoTIFF is unsupported in GeoTools, so this node might work in most cases but not support the full GeoJSON format.

fullDescription.option: The KML to open (often finishing with .kml)

ports.outPort: The population with their attributes and WKT representation.
